welcome-instructions: The only thing you will need to be able to play the game is your mouse or mousepad. Right answers will allow you to proceed with the game. Selecting any wrong answers will result in you failing the task, but please note, that if you happen to fail a task, you can always go back and redo it. In order to proceed, please click on the confirm button.
